Name: Capital of administrative division
Description: A capital of an administrative division is the location (usually a city) where the government is located. This type includes the seats of government of all sub-national administrative divisions, regardless of the term typically used. Thus this type includes administrative centers, county seats, municipal seats, pr√©fectures, etc.

Properties.Name: Capital of
Properties.Description: The administrative division that this is (or was) a capital of.
